name: CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicRectangularTextGaugeView
desc: A template for displaying a header row with a SwiftUI view and text, a second row of text, and a gauge.

items.name: init(headerLabel: Label, headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider, bodyTextProvider: CLKTextProvider, gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider)
items.desc: Creates a new template that has a header row with a SwiftUI view and text, body text, and a gauge.

items.name: var headerLabel: Label
items.desc: The SwiftUI view displayed by the template.

items.name: var headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The header text to display in the complication.

items.name: var bodyTextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The main body text to display in the complication.

items.name: var gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider
items.desc: The gauge to display in the complication.

declaration: final class CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicRectangularTextGaugeView<Label> : CLKComplicationTemplate where Label : View
